<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Récupérer le Résumé du Staking"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/staking/summary/core"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Renvoie les informations globales de staking pour une adresse Core donnée.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"coreAddress","in":"query","required":true,"description":"L'adresse Core pour laquelle récupérer les informations de staking.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Résumé de staking récupéré avec succès.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Code d'état de la réponse."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Informations supplémentaires ou message concernant la réponse."},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"stakedCoreAmount":{"type":"string","description":"TMontant total de CORE staké."},"stakedHashAmount":{"type":"string","description":"TMontant total de HASH staké."},"stakedBTCAmount":{"type":"string","description":"Montant total de BTC staké."},"pendingCoreReward":{"type":"string","description":"Récompense CORE en attente."},"pendingHashReward":{"type":"string","description":"Récompense HASH en attente."},"pendingBTCReward":{"type":"string","description":"Récompense BTC en attente."},"claimedCoreReward":{"type":"string","description":"Récompense CORE réclamée."},"claimedHashReward":{"type":"string","description":"Récompense HASH réclamée."},"claimedBTCReward":{"type":"string","description":"Récompense BTC réclamée."}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Adresse Core fournie invalide","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Code d'état de la réponse."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Message d'erreur expliquant le problème."}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
